sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"flex-1"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h1" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#flex-1"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Flex 1`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Side note: Every block, by default, has `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`display flex`}</MDXTag>{` property enabled.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`When you apply `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`flex 1`}</MDXTag>{` to a block, it will try to take as much space as it's
possible in the view. Check how the examples below are affected by this property,
and as a rule of thumb, add `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`flex 1`}</MDXTag>{` to blocks, when you need them to push
other blocks away, or take more space.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"001-no-flex-1"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h4" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#001-no-flex-1"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`001. No flex 1`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"Flex001.png","alt":"Flex Not Used"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`FlexTest Vertical
backgroundColor #ffaa00
Text
backgroundColor #00fff7
color #323232
fontFamily Montserrat
fontSize 18
fontWeight 400
text Content
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"002-flex-on-the-vertical-only"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h4" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#002-flex-on-the-vertical-only"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`002. Flex on the Vertical only`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"Flex002.png","alt":"Flex On The Vertical Only"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`FlexTest Vertical
flex 1
backgroundColor #ffaa00
Text
backgroundColor #00fff7
color #323232
fontFamily Montserrat
fontSize 18
fontWeight 400
text Content
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"003-flex-on-the-vertical-and-on-the-text-block"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h4" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#003-flex-on-the-vertical-and-on-the-text-block"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`003. Flex on the Vertical and on the Text block`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"Flex003.png","alt":"Flex On The Vertical and Text"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`FlexTest Vertical
flex 1
backgroundColor #ffaa00
Text
flex 1
backgroundColor #00fff7
color #323232
fontFamily Montserrat
fontSize 18
fontWeight 400
text Content
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"004-flex-on-the-horizontal-only"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h4" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#004-flex-on-the-horizontal-only"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`004. Flex on the Horizontal only`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"Flex004.png","alt":"Flex On The Horizontal Only"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Horizontal
flex 1
backgroundColor #ffaa00
Text
backgroundColor #00fff7
color #323232
fontFamily Montserrat
fontSize 18
fontWeight 400
text Content
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"005-flex-on-the-horizontal-and-text"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h4" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#005-flex-on-the-horizontal-and-text"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`005. Flex on the Horizontal and Text`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"Flex005.png","alt":"Flex On The Horizontal and Text"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Horizontal
flex 1
backgroundColor #ffaa00
Text
flex 1
backgroundColor #00fff7
color #323232
fontFamily Montserrat
fontSize 18
fontWeight 400
text Content
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"006-no-flex-1-on-the-vertical-or-on-nested-blocks"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h4" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#006-no-flex-1-on-the-vertical-or-on-nested-blocks"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`006. No Flex 1 on the Vertical or on nested blocks`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"Flex006.png","alt":"No Flex 1 on the Vertical on nested blocks"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Vertical
backgroundColor #ffaa00
Text
backgroundColor #00fff7
color #323232
fontFamily Montserrat
fontSize 18
fontWeight 400
text Content One

Text
backgroundColor #00fff7
color #323232
fontFamily Montserrat
fontSize 18
fontWeight 400
text Content Two
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"007-flex-only-on-the-vertical-with-nested-blocks"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h4" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#007-flex-only-on-the-vertical-with-nested-blocks"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`007. Flex only on the Vertical (with nested blocks)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"Flex007.png","alt":"Flex only on the Vertical with nested blocks"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Vertical
flex 1
backgroundColor #ffaa00
Text
backgroundColor #00fff7
color #323232
fontFamily Montserrat
fontSize 18
fontWeight 400
text Content One

Text
backgroundColor #00fff7
color #323232
fontFamily Montserrat
fontSize 18
fontWeight 400
text Content Two
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"008-flex-on-the-vertical-and-on-nested-blocks"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h4" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#008-flex-on-the-vertical-and-on-nested-blocks"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`008. Flex on the Vertical and on nested blocks`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"Flex008.png","alt":"Flex on the Vertical and on nested blocks"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Vertical
flex 1
backgroundColor #ffaa00
Text
flex 1
backgroundColor #00fff7
color #323232
fontFamily Montserrat
fontSize 18
fontWeight 400
text Content One

Text
flex 1
backgroundColor #00fff7
color #323232
fontFamily Montserrat
fontSize 18
fontWeight 400
text Content Two
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"008a-flex-on-the-vertical-and-on-one-nested-block-only"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h4" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#008a-flex-on-the-vertical-and-on-one-nested-block-only"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`008A. Flex on the Vertical and on one nested block only`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"Flex008A.png","alt":"Flex on the Vertical and on one nested block only"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Vertical
flex 1
backgroundColor #ffaa00
Text
flex 1
backgroundColor #00fff7
color #323232
fontFamily Montserrat
fontSize 18
fontWeight 400
text Content One

Text
backgroundColor #7aedff
color #323232
fontFamily Montserrat
fontSize 18
fontWeight 400
text Content Two
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"009-no-flex-1-on-the-horizontal-or-on-nested-blocks"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h4" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#009-no-flex-1-on-the-horizontal-or-on-nested-blocks"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`009. No Flex 1 on the Horizontal or on nested blocks`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"Flex009.png","alt":"No Flex 1 on the Horizontal or on nested blocks"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Horizontal
backgroundColor #ffaa00
Text
backgroundColor #00fff7
color #323232
fontFamily Montserrat
fontSize 18
fontWeight 400
text Content One

Text
backgroundColor #7aedff
color #323232
fontFamily Montserrat
fontSize 18
fontWeight 400
text Content Two
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"010-flex-only-on-the-horizontal-with-nested-blocks"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h4" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#010-flex-only-on-the-horizontal-with-nested-blocks"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`010. Flex only on the Horizontal (with nested blocks)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"Flex010.png","alt":"Flex only on the Horizontal (with nested blocks)"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Horizontal
flex 1
backgroundColor #ffaa00
Text

color #323232
fontFamily Montserrat
fontSize 18
fontWeight 400
text Content One

Text
backgroundColor #7aedff
color #323232
fontFamily Montserrat
fontSize 18
fontWeight 400
text Content Two
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"011-flex-on-the-horizontal-and-on-nested-blocks"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h4" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#011-flex-on-the-horizontal-and-on-nested-blocks"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`011. Flex on the Horizontal and on nested blocks`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"Flex011.png","alt":"Flex on the Horizontal and on nested blocks"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Horizontal

fontFamily Montserrat
fontSize 18
fontWeight 400
text Content One

Text
flex 1
backgroundColor #7aedff
color #323232
fontFamily Montserrat
fontSize 18
fontWeight 400
text Content Two
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"011a-flex-on-the-horizontal-and-on-one-nested-block-only"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h4" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#011a-flex-on-the-horizontal-and-on-one-nested-block-only"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`011A. Flex on the Horizontal and on one nested block only`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"Flex011A.png","alt":"Flex on the Horizontal and on one nested block only"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>

Text

fontWeight 400

Text
backgroundColor #7aedff
color #323232
fontFamily Montserrat
fontSize 18
fontWeight 400
text Content Two
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Reach out with questions via our `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://slack.viewsdx.com/"}}>{`Slack Questions Channel`}</MDXTag>{`.
Mention `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`@tom`}</MDXTag>{` or `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`@dario`}</MDXTag>{` to make sure that we get your notifications.`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
